snippet: A seat at a state dinner is a relatively painless way for presidents to thank supporters and a time-honored perk of donordom.
abstract: A seat at a state dinner is a relatively painless way for presidents to thank supporters and a time-honored perk of donordom.

headline.main: A Thank You for Obama's Donors, Dinner With Clooney and Cameron
headline.print_headline: Thanking Donors With a State Dinner
